function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid global outbreak of COVID-19","Impact":"High rate of confirmed cases and deaths, strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Enhanced public health education, early diagnosis and treatment, strict infection control measures","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, testing technology, telemedicine","People":"General public, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of knowledge and attitude on COVID-19 promotion and prevention","Impact":"Increased transmission due to poor infection control practices","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns, training on infection control","Technologies":"Online educational resources, virtual training platforms","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health organizations, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Predicted increase in cases without vaccine availability","Impact":"Continued rise in cases, prolonged duration of the pandemic","Mitigation":"Support for ongoing vaccine research, strict adherence to preventive measures","Technologies":"Vaccine development technologies, data analysis for research","People":"General public, researchers, healthcare workers","Owner":"Research institutions, pharmaceutical companies, healthcare organizations"}]}
